home.bio: Seasoned Software Engineer with over a decade of expertise in designing and implementing scalable software solutions. Comprehensive knowledge in Java, C++, TypeScript/JavaScript, along with substantial experience with cloud technologies (AWS, Firebase) and modern frameworks (Spring Boot, React, Next.js).

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools in my professional stack

achievements.api-design: Design and development of RESTful APIs and microservices
achievements.technical-projectmanagement: Technical leadership and agile project management
achievements.customer-support: Technical customer support and stakeholder management
achievements.se: Application of software engineering best practices
achievements.se-system-architecture: Design and implementation of system architectures
achievements.gui-dev: Responsive UI/UX design and frontend implementation
achievements.it-management: IT process optimization and resource management
achievements.effort-estimate: Precise effort estimation and project planning

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Selected project examples from my portfolio

iga.title: Identity Governance & Administration (IGA)
iga.description: Designed and implemented an advanced authorization management system with RESTful API interfaces and specialized adapters for various identity sources.

dpa-import.title: News Import for dpa
dpa-import.description: Implementation of a high-performance system for processing and enriching dpa news data with event-driven architecture and complex business logic.

news-processing.title: News Data Processing
news-processing.description: Development of a scalable pipeline for importing, transforming, and distributing news data with robust error handling and flexible integration interfaces.

autocad-modeling.title: AutoCAD Modeling in CABD Workflow
autocad-modeling.description: Development of a UI for CAD modeling in the CABD workflow with advanced 3D visualization features.

distributor.title: Distribution Line in CABD Workflow
distributor.description: Development and implementation of a module for creating path geometries and distribution lines in Computer Aided Bridge Design (CABD). The project included complex geometry calculations, parameterized path creation, and seamless integration into the SOFiSTiK environment for bridge and structural design.

automated-testing.title: Automated GUI Testing
automated-testing.description: Development of a comprehensive automated test suite for GUI applications with seamless integration into CI/CD pipelines and detailed test reporting.

cicd-web.title: CI/CD for Web Components
cicd-web.description: Implementation of an efficient CI/CD pipeline for web components with automated tests, static code analysis, and optimized build processes.

bakkal-usta.title: Platform App "Bakkal-Usta"
bakkal-usta.description: Development of a mobile platform app with a focus on user-friendly design and seamless backend integration.
